item.title: Riette add a quote by C.H. Spurgeon
item.description: "Hope itself is like a star- not to be seen in the sunshine of prosperity, and only to be discovered in the night of adversity. " -- C.H. Spurgeon

item.title: Riette add a quote by Charles Spurgeon
item.description: "When your will is God's will, you will have your will." -- Charles Spurgeon

item.title: Riette add a quote by C. H. Spurgeon
item.description: "Our anxiety does not empty tomorrow of its sorrows, but only empties today of its strengths." -- C. H. Spurgeon

item.title: Riette add a quote by Charles H. Spurgeon
item.description: "There is hardship in everything except eating pancakes." -- Charles H. Spurgeon

item.title: Riette add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Riette add a quote by Charles Spurgeon
item.description: "If you can't see His way past the tears, trust His heart." -- Charles Spurgeon

item.title: Riette add a quote by John Piper
item.description: "Death is like my car. It takes me where I want to go." -- John Piper

item.title: Riette add a quote by Anne Lamott
item.description: "I do not understand the mystery of grace -- only that it meets us where we are and does not leave us where it found us." -- Anne Lamott

item.title: Riette add a quote by Anonymous
item.description: "And God is able to make all grace abound to you, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work." -- Anonymous

item.title: Riette add a quote by Gracie Allen
item.description: "When I was born I was so surprised I didn't talk for a year and a half." -- Gracie Allen

item.title: Riette add a quote by Phillip Yancey
item.description: "Grace is the most perplexing, powerful force in the universe, and, I believe, the only hope for our twisted, violent planet." -- Phillip Yancey

item.title: Riette add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: Riette add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description:
"Never put off till tomorrow what may be done day after tomorrow just as well".
From: "More Maxims of Mark" -- Mark Twain

item.title: Riette add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Be careful about reading health books. You may die of a misprint." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Riette add a quote by Nelson Mandela
item.description: "I am not a saint, unless you think of a saint as a sinner who keeps on trying." -- Nelson Mandela

item.title: Riette add a quote by Nelson Mandela
item.description: "Where you stand depends on where you sit." -- Nelson Mandela
